special_attacks: mythic power (1/day, surge +1d6), relentless, superior two-weapon fighting
description: Its eyes glowing like bluish-white flames amid the shadows of its kingly helm, this skeleton wields two fearsome scimitars.

sections.body: A mythic skeleton is an animated corpse created with mythic magic such as mythic animate dead. It has an unnatural cunning that belies its mindless nature and a natural instinct for killing.
"Mythic skeleton" is an acquired template that can be added to any creature with the skeleton template (referred to hereafter as the base skeleton).
sections.name: Creating a Mythic Skeleton

sections.body: A mythic skeleton gains the mythic subtype, with a rank equal to half the CR of the base skeleton. Instead of gaining additional abilities according to its CR, it always gains channel resistance +2, relentless, and superior two-weapon fighting. The mythic skeleton gains all other benefits of having the mythic subtype: ability score bonuses, bonus hit points, mythic feats, mythic power, natural armor bonus, and spell resistance increase (if any).
sections.name: Mythic Subtype

sections.body: Adjust the base skeleton's CR according to its mythic rank (this template doesn't increase the base skeleton's CR other than from the mythic rank).
sections.name: CR

sections.body: A mythic skeleton's Hit Dice are determined as though it were a zombie instead of a skeleton.
sections.name: Hit Dice

sections.body: Any melee attack made against a mythic skeleton provokes an attack of opportunity from the skeleton.
sections.name: Relentless

sections.body: A mythic humanoid skeleton usually fights with a scimitar in each hand. It does not take a penalty on attack or damage rolls for attacking with two weapons.
sections.name: Superior Two Weapon Fighting
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Monsters/Skeleton/Mythic/Creating a Mythic Skeleton/Superior Two Weapon Fighting

sections.body: Other types of skeletons have the following additional or altered abilities.
sections.name: Other Mythic Skeletons

sections.body: Destroying a mythic bloody skeleton in the area of a non-mythic bless spell doesn't prevent it from returning to unlife.
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Monsters/Skeleton/Mythic/Other Mythic Skeletons/Mythic Bloody Skeleton
sections.name: Mythic Bloody Skeleton

sections.body: Add half the burning skeleton's mythic rank to its fiery aura damage and melee attack fire damage. Add its mythic rank to the DC of its fiery death ability.
sections.url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Monsters/Skeleton/Mythic/Other Mythic Skeletons/Mythic Burning Skeleton
sections.name: Mythic Burning Skeleton

sections.body: To create a mythic skeletal champion, increase its channel resistance by +2, and add the mythic subtype, additional Hit Dice as if the skeletal champion were a zombie of its size, and mythic abilities according to the base skeletal champion's Hit Dice.
sections.name: Mythic Skeletal Champion
